info.author: Hongkun Yoo
info.description:
# shoutout Python jumbo letter printer # Install pip install shoutout # Usage ```python import shoutout shoutout.loud("Hello!!") ``` 
         
	
 #       #        ####    #           #            ####     ###    ### 
 #       #       #           #           #             #    #     ###    ### 
 #####       ####    #           #             #    #     ##      ##  
 #      #       #          #            #             #    #               
 #      #       ####   #####   #####    ####     ##     ##
or you can create an object! ```python import shoutout loud_msg = shoutout.ShoutOut("World!!") print loud_msg ``` 
         
          
 #          #     ####     #####    #          ###       ###    ### 
 #         #     #     #     #       #   #           #    #     ###    ### 
 #   #   #     #     #     # ###    #            #    #     ##     ##  
  # # # #    #     #     #   #      #             #    #               
   #    #      ####     #      #   #####    ###        ##     ##
info.keywords: Large letters,large letter printer,Shout out loud
info.name: shoutout
